title: St Kilda: the lonely islands
creator_credit: Christopher Mylne and Films of Scotland
brief_description: An evocation of the sense of timelessness which impresses itself on a visitor to this island in the Outer Hebrides. Depicts the unique fauna, and breathtaking beauty of the place, and shows the work of conservationists on the island.
description: An evocation of the sense of timelessness which impresses itself on a visitor to this island in the Outer Hebrides. Depicts the unique fauna, and breathtaking beauty of the place, and shows the work of conservationists on the island.
